Header: Visiting Pakistan Army Team Meets Commander
Content: A five – member group of Army personnel of Pakistan Army now in Sri Lanka under the Army to Army Defence talk arrangement called on Commander of the Army Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake on Friday (10) after their interaction elsewhere outside Colombo. Major General Rehan Abdhul Baqi, Colonel Omar Nasir, Colonel Javed Ali, Staff Sergeant (Nayak Subhedar) Mohamed Iraec, Corporal (Hawaldar) Mohamed Asif Shakir, arrived in Sri Lanka on Saturday (4) and visited Regimental Headquarters Sri Lanka  Armoured Corps (RHQ SLAC), Armoured Corps Training School (ACTS) - Kaleththewa, Kokavil and Trincomalee areas. Colonel of the Regiment, Sri Lanka Armoured Corps, Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Director Plans at Army Headquarters, Brigadier D. T Gamage and Brigade Commander, Armoured Brigade, Brigadier Saman Silva were associated with the commander’s meeting.
